content: If you have 50 marbles and trade 10 for rocks, how many apples do you have?

I'm a bit confused by your question. You started with 50 marbles and traded 10 of them for rocks. Now, you're asking how many apples you have. From what you've told me, it seems like you haven't traded any marbles for apples, so I don't think you have any apples. Maybe you can clarify if there's more to this交易?
